name: Soulker Defense
description:
Soulker Defense is a tactic defense game with a gameplay progressing to a hyperscaled insanity.

Gather gold and items to build and upgrade fighting units to unlock their unique full power.
Try different strategies, items builds and skills to find an effective way to blast enemies.
Let yourself be surprised by various levels checking your creativity and ability to solve challenges.

Features:
- RPG systems like combat, inventory.
- 0% usage of CPU and GPU on pause or when minimized allows you to play the game in the meantime.
- In game achievements unlocking new mechanisms.

Updates:
- The game is still updated with new content and features.
